overview: You can never trust a former slut, especially on her wedding day. No matter how hard they try, slutty women can never reform and become a one man woman. Pure XXX Films presents "My Cheating Bride", a showcase of horny brides who will fuck any man in the room when their new husbands are looking the other way. They shouldn't be wearing white on their wedding days, so why bother wearing a dress at all?
title: My Cheating Bride
